countries.name: Koninkrijk der Belgen
countries.details: In Belgium they actually speak three different official languages: Flemmish, French and German.

countries.name: Japan
countries.details: Japan was a closed community for thousands of years. Its capital, Tokyo, is lit up by thousands of neon light signs at night

countries.name: Brazil
countries.details: Brazil is the home of the Amazon river and holds the largest rainforest ecosystem in the world. Rio de Janairo was host of the 2016 summer Olympic games.

countries.name: Australia
countries.details: One of the biggest attractions of Australia is Uluru, which lies approximately in the middle of the continent. The iconic Sydney Opera house and Sydney Harbour bridge attract millions of visitors each year.

countries.name: Finland
countries.details: Finland is a nice - but cold -country
